alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:25PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jordan, or 9 miles southwest of Baldwinsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, Lysander, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, North Syracuse, Solvay, and East Syracuse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
